statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT media_product_id, feedback FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_date, feedback FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE media_product_id = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE media_product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE media_product_id = 5 AND rating > 2 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating, review_date FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, media_product_id, feedback, rating FROM feedback_and_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY media_product_id, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Product WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, launch_date FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND customer_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_feedbacks FROM Feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.product_name, r.rating FROM customers c JOIN reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.rating > 4;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM reviews;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, media_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT media_name, category FROM media_products WHERE category = 'Movie';
SELECT service_name, description FROM services WHERE service_name = 'Consulting';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, customer_id ASC, media_id
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT feedback_id, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3
SELECT media_name, category FROM media_products WHERE category = 'Movies' ORDER BY media_name ASC
SELECT * FROM services LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM media_products WHERE product_type = 'Music';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM media_products WHERE product_type = 'Movie' AND product_price > 10.00;
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
